name: Colony Chaos
description:
Colony Chaos was created for the 39th GM48 game jam. This is the post-jam release with all the missing bits added and hopefully all the bugs squashed.

The goal of the game is to convince the island's 7 cities to pledge their unwavering loyalty to the crown, raising a green flag to indicate their enthusiasm. While dodging pirates, travel around to engage the townsfolk in various encounters to try to increase their support for the Glorious Empire; sway votes in parliament, quell angry riots, and conduct civilized discussion with the heads of state.

Press H at almost any time for overviews of how to play any given part of the game.
